title: Winning less LP than Losing
body: Its been more than a Week that i constantly lose 20 or more LP on loses and never win more than 19  i have not been in hard lose streak max 4 games then i turn it around i have a 55% win percent and i cant climb this way i think something is wrong

replies.body:
Your MMR is probably really bad.
If you keep winning more than you lose it should be ok again. Just keep playing
I am winning more than losing matchmaking is just horrible

Right now the people you play with and against are lower than the people you're supposed to be playing with.
Therefore you gain less LP than you normally would. With a > 50% winrate your mmr should be normal again ... sooner or later

LP gains and losses aren't a set amount. Basically, if the system thinks you should lose the matchup and you end up winning, you will gain a higher than usual amount of LP. On the flip side, if you lose a match that you 'should' have won you will lose a higher than normal amount of LP. The amount of LP that you gain or lose is mostly based on the odds of winning the match you're in.
yeah i know that but i mean it has been happening every game i lose and win for the past week that should not be right
